messages.subject: The New Samurai Archives Store
messages.msgSnippet: To help offset the cost of the web server for http://www.samurai- archives.com we ve developed the Samurai Archives store, with various merchandise, including
messages.messageBody:
To help offset the cost of the web server for http://www.samurai-
archives.com we've developed the Samurai Archives store, with
various merchandise, including mugs, T-shirts, etc. We'll be adding
more items soon:
http://www.cafeshops.com/samuraiarchives
Take a look and help support the Samurai Archives!

Thank You
